entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then rain showers or flurries at times heavy changing to flurries at times heavy in the afternoon. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
